sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Modal, ModalBody, ModalFooter, ModalHeader, Button } from 'reactstrap' import apiconfig from './../../../../configs/api.config.json' import axios from 'axios' class ViewMenu extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { design_item: [], text:'' } } changeHand = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name] : e.target.value}) } getListDesignItem = (design_id) => { let token = localStorage.getItem(apiconfig.LS.TOKEN) let option = { url: apiconfig.BASE_URL + apiconfig.ENDPOINTS.T_DESIGN_ITEM + '/' + design_id, method: "GET", headers: { "authorization": token } } axios(option) .then(response => { if (response.data.code === 200) { console.log(response.data.message) this.setState({ design_item: response.data.message }) } else { alert(response.data.message) } }) .catch(error => { return error.response.data }) } componentWillReceiveProps(data) { this.getListDesignItem(data.design.code) } render(){ return( Approval Design Request - {this.props.design.code})
